solution_line_template: Betty has {total_red_beads}/{red_beads_per_set} = <<{total_red_beads}/{red_beads_per_set}={num_sets}>>{num_sets} sets of {red_beads_per_set} red beads.
So, she has {num_sets} x {blue_beads_per_set} = <<{num_sets}*{blue_beads_per_set}={total_blue_beads}>>{total_blue_beads} blue beads.
